name: BizAps
overview:
Business Application Associates Ltd was formed in 2001 by three highly experienced SAP business consultants who held the vision to provide business consulting and SAP expertise at a level that not only met but surpassed the expectations of their clients.

In a short space of time our reputation for providing excellence has enabled the business to grow and the scope of our services to expand.

They have gained significant experience in rolling out global SAP templates to implement shared service centres for multinational organisations and have a core of highly experienced SAP finance consultants to support this. Additionally, they develop and deliver SAP Packaged Services which are fixed price, fixed scope products delivering business process efficiencies. The majority of these currently exist within the purchase to pay and order to cash business process areas.

offices.address2: Number 8, Yong An Dong Li, Jian Guo Men Wai
